members.name: Scene
members.description: The scene class represents a distinct screen in the application. This class is designed to be subclassed. Scenes are creat...

members.name: constructor
members.description: Creates a new storymode Scene. Note: scenes are created and managed by the nav class so there should be no ne...

params.description: Optional parameters sent along to the scene construction.
Solid background color of the scene, used by some transitions.
Whether a camera should be created and added to the new scene.

members.name: didLoad
members.description: Called after scene is added to the stage. Call ready() at the end of any initialisation.

params.description: Parent container. This should be passed to super when subclassing.

members.name: ready
members.brief: To be called by the scene after didLoad() when the scene is ready to be presented.

members.name: shouldReloadOnStageResize
members.description: This method is intended to be overridden to handle stage resize logic. Return false to prevent the nav<...

returns.description: shouldReload - Whether the entire scene should be reloaded with a new one.

members.name: _shouldReloadOnStageResize
members.description: This method is called by nav when a stage resize is fired. It should not be sublcassed.

members.name: createApp
members.description: Creates a new PIXI Application, wrapper for new PIXI.Application(...)

params.description: The DOM element in which to add the Pixi canvas.
If true will base the canvas dimensions on the window size rather than the containing element.
Option object to override defaults sent to PIXI. See: http://pixijs.download/release/docs/PIXI.Application.html#Applicatio...
